message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12000?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12500?
